hooks.command: cd tools && uv run ce context health --json | jq -r '(.drift_score | . * 100 | round / 100) as $rounded | if .drift_score > 30 then "⚠️ HIGH DRIFT: " + ($rounded | tostring) + "% - Run: ce context sync" elif .drift_score > 10 then "⚠️ Moderate drift: " + ($rounded | tostring) + "%" else "✅ Context healthy: " + ($rounded | tostring) + "%" end'
